description: Install Node.js runtime versions for ps-nvm. This command is part of ps-nvm and can only be run under PowerShell. More information: https://github.com/aaronpowell/ps-nvm.

useCases.description: Install latest available version of Node.js 20:
Install the x86 (x86 32-bit) / x64 (x86 64-bit) / arm64 (ARM 64-bit) version of Node.js:
Use a HTTP proxy to download Node.js:
